name: Lethal Arrow
description: Plant a masterfully aimed arrow in an enemy's vital spot, dealing 2483 Poison Damage and applying the Poisoned status effect.  Also afflicts enemy with Minor Defile, which reduces their healing received and Health Recovery by 8% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Deals Poison Damage and always applies the Poisoned status effect. Also applies Minor Defile to the enemy, reducing their healing received.
coefDescription: Plant a masterfully aimed arrow in an enemy's vital spot, dealing $1 Poison Damage and applying the Poisoned status effect.  Also afflicts enemy with Minor Defile, which reduces their healing received and Health Recovery by 8% for 4 seconds.
rawDescription:
Plant a masterfully aimed arrow in an enemy's vital spot, dealing <<1>> and applying the Poisoned status effect.

Also afflicts enemy with <<2>>, which reduces their healing received and Health Recovery by <<3>> for <<4>>.
